fields.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: Harry Potter receives his first letters from Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, much to the dismay of his abusive aunt and uncle.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts School for a second year of studying, unbeknownst to him the Chamber of Secrets has been opened by his oldest enemy.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts for his third year of study, although much has changed this year, with soul draining Dementors and the crazy Sirius Black on the loose from Azkaban.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: Big changes are being made across the world of Harry Potter, with the schools of Durmstrang and Beauxbaton arriving at Hogwarts for the Tri Wizard Tournament. However, the dark lord Voldemort is secretly gathering strength and plans to strike when Harry is at his most vulnerable.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: In Harrys 5th year at Hogwarts he is persecuted for his claims of Voldemorts return, with the Ministry of Magic appointing a new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, Dolores Umbridge.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: The second to last book in the Harry Potter Series, In this book the final plot lines for the saga are approaching culmination. Much is learned about Lord Voldemort, including snippets of his childhood and many of his actions whilst he still went by the name Tom Riddle

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
fields.author: J.K. Rowling
fields.story_overview: The final book in the Harry Potter Saga, Harry Ron and Hermione are on the run from the Dark Lord, who's power and Influence has risen to new heights. With the help of numerous friends and allies, the trio seek to destroy each of Voldemorts Horcruxes, with Harry facing him for one final confrontation

fields.title: Mister Monday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview:
After a mysterious encouter with a pair of men whilst at school, Arthur Penhaligon is given a relic in the shape of a clock hand and is named Heir to the House, a strange otherworld realm.

Aided by the strange child Suzy Turqoise Blue and the Will of the Architect, he battles against the Denizens of the House to claim the second clock hand relic and defeats its owner and ruler of the first floor of the House, Mister Monday

fields.title: Grim Tuesday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview: Returning back to the House moments after he left, Arthur must battle against another Trustee, Lord Tuesday,  ruler of the far reaches, who has seized control of Arthur's domain in his absence

fields.title: Drowned Wednesday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview: Whilst recovering at hospital, Arthur and his friend Leaf are transported to the Border Se, the domain of Duchess Wednesday,  tasked with finding her Key and curing her of her afflictions

fields.title: Sir Thursday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview:
A doppelgänger has replaced Arthur and is prevening him from leaving the House. Forcefully conscripted into the Army of the Great Maze in their war against the Piper, one of the Architect's children, Arthur has his memory wiped and must somehow regain his memory, defeat both Piper and Sir Thursday, Trustee of the Great Maze, and not die in the process.

In his absence, Leaf fights against the 'Skinless Boy', Arthur's doppelgänger, who is spreading disease known as the 'Greyspot'

fields.title: Lady Friday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview:
When it comes to Lady Friday, the beautiful and refined Trustee of the Middle House, there's more than meets the eye. Abidcating her throne and Key, she declared that whomever could find her Key would become the next ruler of her mountainous demense. 

Competing against Arthur is the Piper, whom he battled with during his conscription, and Saturday, the powerful ruler of the Upper House one of the remaining Trustees of the Architect's Will

fields.title: Superior Saturday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview:
Envious over the domain of Sunday held above her, Saturday has been slowly destroying the House so she can invade and usurp control! With the House sinking into Nothing, Arthur must claim her Key to repair the damage done before it is too late...

What's more,  his adventures have slowly transformed him into something more than human, making him unable to return to his world without negative effect

fields.title: Lord Sunday
fields.author: Garth Nix
fields.story_overview: As the series reaches the finale, Arthur must compete with Saturday, Lord Sunday and the Piper for the fate of the collapsing House, to save it and as a result the Univers

fields.title: Storm Breaker
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: A young boy becomes a spy

fields.title: Point Blanc
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: Alex rider returns to investigate the mysterious deaths of wealthy billionaires

fields.title: Skeleton Key
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: Rider sent to investigate the island Skeleton Key

fields.title: Eagle Strike
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: Eagle Strike follows Alex Rider as he goes rogue from MI6 to stop a madman celebrity from launching the United States' arsenal of nuclear missile at drug-producing countries across the world in an attempt to stop the drug trade.

fields.title: Scorpia
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: The plot concerns the plans of a criminal organisation attempting to disrupt the "Special Relationship" between the United Kingdom and the United States, which Alex foils by infiltrating the organisation.

fields.title: Ark Angel
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: Alex foils the plot of another billionaire, venturing into space

fields.title: Snakehead
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: after landing from space, alex works for the austrialian secret service

fields.title: Crocodile Tears
fields.author: Anthony Horowitz
fields.story_overview: While staying with Sabina’s family in Scotland, Alex Rider meets international do-gooder Desmond McCain. But a simple card game between them rapidly leads to a duel to the death – one that could result in the destruction of an entire country.

fields.title: The Last Wish
fields.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
fields.story_overview: A collection of short stories concerning Geralt, a superhuman monster hunter known as a 'witcher'

fields.title: Season of Storms
fields.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
fields.story_overview: More chronicles of the witheer Geralt of Rivia

fields.title: Sword of Destiny
fields.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
fields.story_overview: chronicles of the witcher Geralt of Rivia and his relationship with Yennefer of Vengerberg

fields.title: Blood of Elves
fields.author: Andrzej Sapkowski
fields.story_overview: Follows the events following the fall of Cintra, as powers vie for the control of Ciri, a child of the Elder Blood

fields.title: One Piece
fields.author: Oda Eiirchiro
fields.story_overview:
Wealth. Fame. Power. The world had it all obtained by one man - The Pirate King, Gold Roger. At his death, the words he spoke drove countles men to the sea. 

"My Treasure, you ask? If you want it, I'll give it to you... Go find it! Everything the world has, I left it in that place!"

fields.title: Tower of God
fields.author: SIU
fields.story_overview: What do you desire? Fortune? Glory? Power? Revenge? Or info on the Tower of God characters and storyline? If it's the latter, then all you desire is here.

fields.title: The Magician
fields.author: Raymond Feist
fields.story_overview: The first novel in the Riftwar Saga, an orphan boy Pug becomes the apprentice of his lord's magician. The Kingdom is rife with uncertainty towards the throne, when they are attacked by invaders from another world crossing through a rift in space and time

fields.title: Dracula
fields.author: Bram Stoker
fields.story_overview: The Original Dracula

fields.title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
fields.author: Lewis Carroll
fields.story_overview: A young girl named alice falls down a rabbit hole into a nonsensical world

fields.title: Red Dragon
fields.author: Thomas Harris
fields.story_overview:
Will Graham was a brilliant profiler of criminals for the FBI - until he suffered terrible injuries in the process of capturing Dr Hannibal 'the Cannibal' Lecter.

Years later, a serial killer nicknamed 'the Tooth Fairy' is massacring entire families each full moon. With the FBI desperate for progress, Will reluctantly agrees to consult. But he soon realises that he alone can't crack the case; he needs the help of the only mind even better than his own at understanding the mentalities of psychopaths.

fields.title: The Handmaid's Tale
fields.author: Margaret Atwood
fields.story_overview: "Everything Handmaids wear is red: the colour of blood, which defines us." Offred is a Handmaid in the Republic of Gilead, where women are prohibited from holding jobs, reading, and forming friendships. She serves in the household of the Commander and his wife, and under the new social order she has only one purpose: once a month, she must lie on her back and pray that the Commander makes her pregnant, ecause in an age of declining births, Offred and the other Handmaids are valued only if they are fertile. But Offred remembers the years before Gilead, when she was an independent woman who had a job, a family, and a name of her own. Now, her memories and her will to survive are acts of rebellion.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.author: Harper Lee
fields.story_overview:
'Shoot all the bluejays you want, if you can hit 'em, but remember it's a sin to kill a mockingbird.'

A lawyer's advice to his children as he defends the real mockingbird of Harper Lee's classic novel - a black man falsely charged with the rape of a white girl. Through the young eyes of Scout and Jem Finch, Harper Lee explores with exuberant humour the irrationality of adult attitudes to race and class in the Deep South of the 1930s. The conscience of a town steeped in prejudice, violence and hypocrisy is pricked by the stamina of one man's struggle for justice. But the weight of history will only tolerate so much.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings
fields.author: JRR Tolkein
fields.story_overview:
"One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them. In the Land of Mordor, where the Shadows lie..."

A high-fantasy epic detailing the journey of a group of companions from their village in the Shire to the depths of Mount Doom, the seat of the greatest evil of the Third Age, the Dark Lord Sauron. Join Sam, on his quest to assist his hapless traitor of a friend on their journey to destroy the One Ring

fields.title: Full Metal Alchemist
fields.author: Arakawa Hiromu
fields.story_overview: After an attempt to use alchemy to bring their mother back to life, the Elric  brother's transmutation backfires, Edward losing his left leg and Alphonse hsi entire body. In their journey to return their bodies to normal Edward becomes a State Alchemist, bestowed the title Full Metal Alchemist. He and his brother search for the Philosopher's Stone, a mythical object that can break the laws of alchemy

fields.title: Dune
fields.author: Frank Herbert
fields.story_overview:
"Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me."

Dune tells the story of young Paul Atreides, whose family accepts the stewardship of the planet Arrakis. While the planet is an inhospitable and sparsely populated desert wasteland, it is the only source of melange, or "the spice," a drug that extends life and enhances mental abilities.

fields.title: Dune Messiah
fields.author: Frank Herbert
fields.story_overview:
Twelve years after the events described in Dune, Paul "Muad'Dib" Atreides rules as Emperor. By accepting the role of messiah to the Fremen, Paul had unleashed a jihad which conquered most of the known universe. 

Paul is the most powerful emperor ever known, but is powerless to stop the lethal excesses of the religious juggernaut he has created. Although 61 billion people have perished, Paul's prescient visions indicate that this is far from the worst possible outcome for humanity. 

Motivated by this knowledge, Paul hopes to set humanity on a course that will not inevitably lead to stagnation and destruction, while at the same time acting as ruler of the empire and focal point of the Fremen religion.

fields.title: Boku no Hero Academia
fields.author: Horikoshi Kōhei
fields.story_overview: In a world where everyone is born with Quirks(superpowers), Midoriya Izuku is born quirkless, but aims to be a hero. His opportunity comes when his idol, the number one hero All Might, offers him a chance to obtain his quirk and a position at the prestigious UA Academy. This is the story of how Deku becomes the Number One Hero.

fields.title: Tokyo Ghoul
fields.author: Ishida Sui
fields.story_overview: An alternate world where humans live alongside 'Ghouls', creatures who look like humans but possess strength and abilities can only survive of human flesh. after an attack by one of them hospitalise him, Kaneki Ken is transformed into a half-ghoul via a tissue transplant
